response.overview: Ready for some fast-paced hoops action with all your favorites? NBA Jam: The Music Videos is a sports documentary featuring NBA highlights of the 1990s. Viewers will see superstars Scottie Pippen, Hakeem Olajuwon, Alonzo Mourning, Patrick Ewing, and a host of others slam-dunking to the music of the Spin Doctors, Gloria Estefan, Joe Public, and Luther Vandross in this 50-minute program. Various NBA music videos from 1995
response.title: NBA Jam: The Music Videos
